attributes.action: see that the names of all those killed in conflicts since the end of WW2 are inscribed on there local war memorials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people have given their lives in the service of the country.I believe it needs to be recorded locally and not only on a national memorial that the majority of the population will never get to see

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
